title: Looking for players
body:
Username: Chronosima

Hi all!
I'm pretty new to League of Legends, having only played a few times about a year ago before quitting. But I decided to come back now that I have purchased a new laptop so I can finally handle LOL without the terrible lag!

I'm a little rusty at this game and have only been playing against bots for now, gradually moving myself up to a harder difficulty (currently on the second one). So I'm just looking to make a few friends on here that I can play with and maybe get a lot better at by receiving tips and strategies! This would be really helpful. As stated above, my username is Chronosima. I'm able to get on everyday, or whenever I just feel like playing. You can send me a Facebook request if you want to get in contact with me and I'm not online. 

By the way, I'm not to sure if this would help but I'm 19 going on 20 next year so I'm not one of those screaming, prepubescent teenager! :)
Can't wait to hear from you all!

- Chronosima
